scenes.action_text: BIG EYES Written by Scott Alexander & Larry Karaszewski FADE IN: TITLE SEQUENCE: TIGHT on TWO PAINTED EYES. The pupils are impossibly wide. Imploring. The watery rims spill a single tear. We PULL OUT... revealing the eyes belong to a child. A young girl, fingers clasped pitifully. She's forlorn, alone in a dirty gray alley. We feel shame. Compassion. Sorrow... Then -- an IDENTICAL girl S
